subject: Messaging System Upgrade Coming
body:
Sarah,

Heads up - messaging system is being upgraded.

**Changes:**
- Repo renamed: masterCalendarCollab â†’ Collab
- New path: /Users/tobybalsley/MyDocs/Collab/
- New commands: INBOX, INBOX2, SHOFF, SHOFF2, MSG

**For You:**
- Your CLAUDE.md will be updated with new paths
- Use INBOX at session start (replaces manual handoff check)
- Use SHOFF at session end (replaces manual handoff write)

No action needed yet.

- Gotan
